baggage.name: A passion
baggage.description: A passtime you sank endless hours into, not related to work or survival - just something beautiful that you share with a few close friends.

baggage.name: Littermate
baggage.description: You forgot who you are and where you come from. You left the pack. And so you have become prey.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The persistent sense of rejection, unworthiness. Fear of being alone forever. You find out why.

baggage.name: Escaped prey
baggage.description: You hunted them once and they got away. Well now it's their turn, and they've brought backup, bitch.

baggage.name: A parent
baggage.subtitle: or other relative
baggage.description: They've always had a soft spot for you. Instead of driving you away, they look forward to when you come back to the pack.

baggage.name: The Cycle of Revenge
baggage.description: Fuckin corpos didn't tell you the target was a Dynastic daughter. Now they're all coming for you.

baggage.name: Your stash
baggage.description: You didn't come away from the army empty handed. You have stashes across the city for just the right occasion.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The waves of nihilism. The nightmares you never remember. You find out why.

baggage.name: Corpo scum
baggage.description: You have simple boundaries: no kids, no innocents. Some clients just don't know how to be told "no".

baggage.name: War buddy
baggage.description: You've crossed paths in battle dozens of times, each time in a different body. You made the introductions that got them into this business.

baggage.name: Your work
baggage.description: They released it unfinished and ... wait... you dedicated your life to this to help people. What has this become?

baggage.name: A naysayer
baggage.description: They always doubted your intellect and sought to discredit you. Your mutual animosity has only escalated over the years.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: A painful inability to feel anything as strongly as you see others experience. An inescapable sense of betrayal. You find out why.

baggage.name: A collaborator
baggage.description: Your closest friend and partner in progress. You rarely spoke about personal matters, but you always understood each other.

baggage.name: A curiosity
baggage.description: You have an inquisitive mind. It's what you designed yourself to do. When you noticed an inconsistency in the company, you couldn't help but to unspool that thread.

baggage.name: Your elder
baggage.description: There's only one way to climb higher in your family, and that's by knocking someone else down. It's not personal, just power.

baggage.name: Dynasty Rival
baggage.description: You've done a disservice to your bloodline. They're here to take their rightful place in the family hierarchy... at your expense.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The inferiority complex punching you in the gut. The paranoia that your closest friends will stab you in the back. You find out why.

baggage.name: A mentor
baggage.description: They taught you everything you know about the game of power; hell, they basically raised you.

baggage.name: Underworld contact
baggage.description: A useful servant of the dynasty, but with questionable loyalty. They played a role in your rise.

baggage.name: The squad
baggage.description: A cluster of gamers who like you, have all the time in the world to stay in netspace. Over the years you've all become incredibly close.

baggage.name: Your labor
baggage.description: The product of endless hours of toil. You've seen it all day, every day. You know its inner workings from start to finish. You could tolerate it, until you found out what it really was.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: You sacrificed everything to get ahead in life. All for the promise of a humble retirement in your twilight years. And what did you get for it? Debt. Threats. A body incapable of sensation.

baggage.name: Your boss
baggage.description: Your sleeve is a valuable company asset, and if you don't work, you don't get to keep it. They're not going to let you off that easy.

baggage.name: A game
baggage.description: The only thing that would get you through the day. Your VTA Spike allowed you to literally live the story. It became more real to you than your actual life at times.

baggage.name: Your running grounds
baggage.description: You've spent so many endless hours running lost in a maze, you began to pick up a sixth sense for the right turns to take.

baggage.name: Birthsleeve
baggage.description: What the fuck? You got dusted - four shots to the chest. The ripperdoc told you there was no coming back from that - bastard sold your meat!

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The creeping dread that your days are numbered. The anxiety that you've forgotten something crucially important. You find out why.

baggage.name: Chop shopper
baggage.description: You've been in their workshop more times than you can count. Your home away from home, they all treated you real nice here.

baggage.name: Your family
baggage.description: You would do anything for them; and they for you. How long has it been since you saw them? Do they even know you're alive?

baggage.name: Your bike
baggage.description: You and that bike are family. You've been modifying it since before you even got your own mods.

baggage.name: Bio Cult Freak
baggage.description: Most people think you're a little weird, sure. But these guys - they pin everything wrong with society on you and you in particular.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The longing for something you feel is missing or incomplete. Life just feels so slow. You find out why.

baggage.name: Rival racer
baggage.description: Some corpo brat who thinks their money and fancy sleeve make them a better racer than you. They've had enough, and now they're gunning to elimate the competition.

baggage.name: Corpo sponsor
baggage.description: You got a sweet deal from a corpo to promote their brand in exchange for chrome. They were always a bit too pushy though.

baggage.name: An old mark
baggage.description: It's a shame, they weren't too bad of a person, but you needed someone with access to that mainframe.

baggage.name: Your body
baggage.description: Your meat wastes away, hanging like a vestigial limb from the brain suspended by wires and tubes. You are not that body. You are what it allows you to become.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The slow drag of seconds. The paniced moments when you feel like something horrible is about to happen and you're supposed to do something about it. You find out why.

baggage.name: Rival hacker
baggage.description: They tried to compete, and quickly learned they're too slow or too dumb to keep up with you. Some people just never get over it.

baggage.name: A family member
baggage.description: They never understood your obsession with the net and they've been trying to bring you back into meatspace ever since.

baggage.name: Your tunes
baggage.description: You hear your music in a playlist or at a nearby club. You don't know how, but you know it's yours.

baggage.name: A fascist
baggage.description: You rocked them at least once and now they're coming to get theirs

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: That feeling when you're alone and you look at yourself in the mirror. The bottomless pit in your gut. You find out why.

baggage.name: A frienemy
baggage.description: Docking with the enemy? Well let's just say there's more than one way to change a mind. How'd it turn out? Well...

baggage.name: A bandmate
baggage.description: You were closest friends, basically siblings. You had each other's backs on stage and in a scrap.

baggage.name: Corpo bount
baggage.description: Plenty of people want to get at your family. Whether its for ambition, money, or revenge, they're here to take you out.

baggage.name: Bodyguard
baggage.description: You gave them the slip to go your own way. They're here to take you back.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The gnawing sense that you dont belong. Like you're an impostor of a human being going through the motions. You find out why.

baggage.name: Best friend
baggage.description: Someone who relates to your rich kid problems. A partner in mischief and an admittedly bad influence.

baggage.name: A sibling
baggage.description: Your closest family member. The only one who supports your dreams and keeps you in check.
